(C) Ambiguous

Option (A) "Asked the designer" is incorrect because there is no evidence in the sentence to suggest that the designer was the one who was shown the blueprint.

Option (C) "Ambiguous" is incorrect because the antecedent of the pronoun "her" is clearly established as "the cook." However, if there were additional information in the sentence that was not provided, it could be argued that the pronoun is ambiguous.
